languages.text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что сотворен новый Мессия? Истинно ли утверждение, что единица Амарнат более не существует, но Цикл будет прерван?"
"Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
languages.original_text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что сотворен новый Мессия? Истинно ли утверждение, что единица Амарнат более не существует, но Цикл будет прерван?"

traits.locale_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
"Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
"Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
"Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
"Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

languages.text: “进行询问。新的弥赛亚已经出现这种说法是真的吗？尽管阿玛纳特这一单位已经消失，但循环必将终止，这种说法是真的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: “进行询问。新的弥赛亚已经出现这种说法是真的吗？尽管阿玛纳特这一单位已经消失，但循环必将终止，这种说法是真的吗？”

languages.text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle un nouveau messie a été créé est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle l'unité Amarnat n'existe plus, mais que le Cycle sera interrompu est-elle vraie ? »
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle un nouveau messie a été créé est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle l'unité Amarnat n'existe plus, mais que le Cycle sera interrompu est-elle vraie ? »

languages.text: «Pregunta: ¿Es cierto que se ha creado un nuevo mesías? ¿Es cierto que la unidad Amarnat ha cesado de existir, pero el Ciclo se interrumpirá?».
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: «Pregunta: ¿Es cierto que se ha creado un nuevo mesías? ¿Es cierto que la unidad Amarnat ha cesado de existir, pero el Ciclo se interrumpirá?».

languages.text: 「質問だ。新しい救世主が誕生したという発言は真実なのか？ユニット・アマルナトはもはや存在しないが、サイクルは廃止されるという発言は本当か？」
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: 「質問だ。新しい救世主が誕生したという発言は真実なのか？ユニット・アマルナトはもはや存在しないが、サイクルは廃止されるという発言は本当か？」

languages.text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass ein neuer Messias erschaffen wurde? Stimmt die Aussage, dass die Amarnat-Einheit nicht mehr existiert, der Zyklus aber unterbrochen wird?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass ein neuer Messias erschaffen wurde? Stimmt die Aussage, dass die Amarnat-Einheit nicht mehr existiert, der Zyklus aber unterbrochen wird?"

languages.text: "Sual: Yeni bir Mesih'in yaratıldığı doğru mu? Amarnat adlı birimin artık var olmadığı ve Döngü'nün süreğinin bozulacağı doğru mu?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that a new Messiah has been created true? Is the statement that the Amarnat unit no longer exists but the Cycle will be discontinued true?"
